about_the_game:
'Numb - Just Don't Think About It' is a minimalistic psychological horror game inspired by the likes of 'Home,' 'Claire,' 'Lone Survivor,' and 'World of Horror'.

You are B, an unextraordinary individual embodying modern society's struggles. A monotonous day turns nightmarish as one of your apartment building’s residents dies in mysterious circumstances and the hallways morph into an ethereal labyrinth filled with unsettling creatures. Trapped inside, you need to face all kinds of horrors to survive.

⬛ Explore


Navigate through hallways of fear, search for and use items to progress, and unveil the truth. Pay attention to your surroundings: danger is always around the corner, and nothing is as it seems.

⬛ Fight


Face different challenges every day. Confront horrors in various ways: shoot, close your eyes, or bypass them, but keep moving forward.

⬛ Survive


Maintain that shred of sanity you have left by holding on to the routines that ground you.

content_descriptors.notes: Trigger alert: the whole game explores sensitive themes related to mental health, including self-harm.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Arch Linux
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Numb - Just Don't Think About It

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Explore, fight, and survive in this minimalistic psychological horror set in the depths of the human psyche. A story about perception and empathy.
